nutritionCalculator.title: Nutrition Calculator
nutritionCalculator.description: Track your daily nutrition and reach your goals
nutritionCalculator.welcomeMessage: Start your journey to a healthier you today!
nutritionCalculator.foodDatabaseDescription: Search and add foods to your meals
nutritionCalculator.savedMealsDescription: Create and manage your custom meals.
nutritionCalculator.noSavedMeals: No saved meals yet. Create your first one!
nutritionCalculator.createSavedMealDescription: Combine food items to create a reusable meal.
nutritionCalculator.noItemsInMeal: No items added to this meal yet.
nutritionCalculator.nutritionPerServingDescription: Nutritional values for the specified serving size.
nutritionCalculator.todaysIntakeDescription: Summary of your nutrition for today.
nutritionCalculator.addFoodToLogDescriptionDialog: Specify servings and meal type for this food item.
nutritionCalculator.dailyLogEntriesDescription: All food items logged for today.
nutritionCalculator.noEntriesYet: No food entries for today yet. Start logging your meals!
nutritionCalculator.recognizeFoodImageDescription: Upload an image to identify food items.
nutritionCalculator.noFoodsRecognized: No foods recognized. Try another image!

toast.mealItemsRequired: Add at least one food item to the meal.
toast.foodRemovedFromLog: Food item removed from daily log.
toast.invalidServings: Servings must be a positive number.
toast.foodRecognitionFailed: Failed to recognize food. Please try again.
